body:
Hello! I am currently offering PVP montages for all Avicus minigames! Here is a description.
I cannot film on Saturdays, due to the fact that I'm busy. I will try the best quality that I can. If you want a spot, please enter the template at the very bottom. Check out your montages at https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC70yBiw2uvl1eRUYslmGUIA/videos
-Nexus
 I will film your kills. Simple.

-Nebula
 I will film monument destroys and kills. Please include which servers you go on in template if you want Nebula.

-CTH
I will film the points you earn in the middle and kills.

Only these games can be accepted.
                                                                                  Times (note the plural!) you come on:
Template (IMPORTANT!)                                      (if you go to school, tell me time on
IGN (In Game Name):                                               school days and tell me time on         
Minigame You Want to Be Filmed On:                    weekends).
Time Zone:                                                             Music you would like to input on montage:
